description: Crypto-native payments for storage on Storacha with SOL and FIL. No credit card needed.
end_user:
Storacha Onchain Payments is an open-source, multi-chain proof-of-concept for decentralized, pay-as-you-go storage payments.

The Solana SDK (Phase 1) enables per-upload payments in native SOL with UCAN-based storage delegation and linear escrowed rewards for providers, supporting pure crypto-native billing and Solana Mobile dapp integration.

In 2025, the project expanded to Filecoin (Phase 2) with USDFC-based per-file payments on the Filecoin Calibration Testnet, integrating Synapse SDK for warm storage, UCAN delegation, and escrow-based release after storage confirmation.

Storacha brings simple, programmable payment flows for decentralized storage and aims to make Filecoin storage as easy to access as any modern cloud API â€” powered entirely by on-chain settlement.
testimonials: Since it is still a work in progress, we do not have testimonials yet.
